mapper.insert: INSERT into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE bno = #{bno};
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 as rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board ,(select @ROWNUM := 0) tmp where @ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} - 1 order by bno desc ) a where a.rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} ;
